content: - 13 -      short-run and long-run challenges we face.  I have no doubt, however, that those   challenges can be met, and that the fundamental strengths of our economy will ultimately   reassert themselves.  The Federal Reserve will certainly do all that it can to help restore   high rates of growth and employment in a context of price stability.
